title: WOW! This Is Why Shahrukh Khan Chose Mahira Khan For Raees!
text:
Posted by: Swikriti Srivastava Published: Monday, October 19, 2015, 18:53 [IST] 
Shahrukh Khan 's upcoming film, Raees , is in tremendous buzz because of two reasons; first is its promising teaser which has already raised our expectations about the film and second is its unique cast i.e. Pakistani actress Mahira Khan , who will be seen romancing Shahrukh in this flick!And recently, Shahrukh revealed that why he chose Mahira for Raees . "She's beautiful, she's fantastic and she has a very different style of acting." 
"The reason we took her in the film was [that] we wanted it to be very different as far as the leading lady was concerned, and she brings that to the table and much more." Shahrukh was being quoted as saying, while interacting with the press in Edinburgh.Even before, when a fan asked Shahrukh on Twitter to describe her in one word, he chose to give an amazing response.Shahrukh wrote, "@ImmiHamna very earnest and working extremely hard. A bit nervous too but very very good at what she does. It's a pleasure."Meanwhile check out some beautiful snaps of Mahira Khan! WOW!
